title: enna puNNiyam
sahitya:
enna puNNiyam sheidEnO nAn inda nannATTinil vandu pirandiDavE


anupallavi

  mannar mUvarum vaLartta tIntamizh inbam kAdinil enrum shEravE


caraNam    ambuviyOrkkellAm amudenavE vaLar kamba nADan tarum kAviyam kETkavum 
inba vAzhkaiyE eida meimmarai tanda vaLLuvan tamizh paDikkavum
